SEARCH
Package fang2.sprites

Class InputStringSprite

java.lang.Object
fang2.core.Sprite
fang2.sprites.StringSprite
fang2.sprites.InputStringSprite
public class InputStringSprite extends StringSprite
This is a StringSprite that changes when text is typed on it. Note: this sprite must be on the screen (but not necessarily visible) in order to receive keyboard input.

  • Field Summary
